Name: Bourse
Phrase: Mon petit Vivi, there you are. We were worried when you suddenly disappeared.'

Name: Bourse
Phrase: That's le Bourse's line. You didn't return for a long while, so le Bourse came to pick you up on behalf of the Gendarmerie, Vivi.

Name: Bourse
Phrase: Oh, for goodness sake, le Bourse was planning to go shopping in the city after this. It's so hard being Vivi's nanny.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: ... pfft, Hahaha! Bourse, don't be silly.

Name: Bourse
Phrase: What's so funny? Le Bourse's just telling the truth.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: What do you mean you're my nanny then, Bourse?

Name: Bourse
Phrase: Yes, that's right, petit Vivi. Vivi's mother and the village chief has asked me to look after you.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: I don't recall that they did...

Name: Bourse
Phrase: Oh please, please put yourself in le Bourse's shoes, who has to work on her day off. Vivi once crossed past the safe zone lines to the Western side, didn't you? You even got carried away chasing a wild boar and fell off a cliff.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: But that was when I was a small girl, you know?

Name: Bourse
Phrase: Le Bourse doesn't mind you being a mischievous tomboy, but you should also be aware of the trouble you're causing for the Forestiers and the rangers.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Well... the time I fell off a cliff chasing a wild boar, I crawled back to the Eastern side by my own will and I'm sure the boys I was with weren't injured.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: That's strange. I'm surprised you knew about this, Bourse.

Name: Bourse
Phrase: You have been playing with boys more often since you're small, mon petit Vivi. All you did was hunting and combat training, and you played in the forest all the time.

Name: Bourse
Phrase: You weren't interested in playing house or dolls. So you grew up like the tomboy you are, so naturally you didn't have many girl friends. You keep doing all these dangerous things and that worried everyone.

Name: Bourse
Phrase: Why don't you take a leaf out of le Bourse's book? Le Bourse blends in well with groups of girls. Le Bourse has the communication skills to get on with anyone. Le Bourse also knows a lot about dolls and clothes.

Name: Bourse
Phrase: Why don't you wear at least one perfume, petit Vivi? Ah, but Vivi isn't interested in that sort of thing, are you? You'd be more suited to getting down and dirty and running along animal trails.

Name: Bourse
Phrase: Look, let's go home early. Le Bourse will show you the way home. It's not safe for Vivi to walk alone at night yet.

Name: Bourse
Phrase: Vivi is a real nuisance without le Bourse's help. Next time, le Bourse will show you what fashion is all about.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: You're going to teach me what fashion is...

Name: ...Yes, please teach me. You, Bourse will coordinate everything, from the hat to the shoes to the perfume.
'What's that nasty look in your eyes? You're grinning at me and it's disgusting.
Haha, I'm sorry. I was kind of happy whenever I see your face, Bourse.

Bourse, when you were little, you had a hard time talking to people. You used to stay at home and play with dolls all the time... I never noticed how lonely you were and I only spent all my time playing in the woods with the boys.

I'm sure Bourse isn't interested in playing outside. You are not good at exercise, so you wouldn't like it even if I invited you to play with the boys. I assumed that was the case and never invited you to play with me. Our family is like close friends... Non, we are family.
But years later I ended up feeling the same way as you.

When I was old enough and started getting interested in decorations and perfume, I couldn't bring myself to mention it to a group of girls. I would sneak out into the city on my own. I remember making my first girly jewelry box...
Then people heard that the tomboy Vivienne had an eye for fashion. I was embarrassed to be teased at. Besides, I didn't know how to hang out with girls even till now.
I was lonely. I kept wondering if someone would ask me out. That's why I was so happy when Bourse took an interest in my jewelry box.
Le Bourse you know then, petit Vivi, is different from le Bourse of today. Le Bourse can do everything, is popular with both boys and girls, and is very good at hunting and battling.
Are you not jealous of le Bourse, petit Vivi?
Of course not. I told you earlier, didn't I? I'm happy.
Surely the magic of the forest has changed you. I like this kind of Bourse. Indoor Bourse, outdoor Bourse, I like them both.
Here, let me have a closer sniff at you, and share your scent with me.
I'll take you all in. I embrace all of you.
